title: Scheme Term
description: A Latimer Core term used by the LatimerCoreScheme and the rules relating to its application. This class can be used to define which of the terms (classes and/or properties) within the standard (e.g. GeographicContext, Taxon, preservationMethod) are expected to be used within the scheme, and specify whether they're mandatory and/or repeatable. This information can be used by software and queries to validate the data and understand the rules by which metrics can be reported against the specified term.
